attributes.title: Why so glitchy??
attributes.review: Wow, I was just trying to get connected and thought the app would be a great idea: WRONG! What’s going on with the developers of this app? I can’t even open it, I tap it to open and it just stays on the loading/logo screen forever and then crashes?? So much for that, this campaign already running itself into the ground all on its own I guess LOL.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: First of all, this app took wayyyyy too long to download. I just want to support our amazing “leader” and it took days. Secondly, this app was terrifying. The first thing that came up was a zoomed in picture of cheeto mans face. I don’t want to see every clogged pore on that mans body. And it was so difficult to manage. Any time I pressed a button it took me back to his oompa loompa face. Do not recommend!

attributes.title: I’m allergic to this 😡
attributes.review: I am a 76 year old chimpanzee extraordinaire 🥵 but this app showed me no love toward anything I have aspired to become 😡 I am severely allergic to oranges 🍊 and my 30 year old boyfriend would tell you the same 🤧 they should have a warning label for allergies in this app. I asked to speak to the manager, but they said he was at a “rally”. 🤬🤬💀 As a former customer of this app I feel misrepresented and disregarded 🤡

attributes.title: TERRIBLEST APP EVER !!!
attributes.review: omg i downloaded this app and right when i clicked on it i got a knock on my door and i opened my door and there was a basket of oranges ,i closed my door and turned around and there he was the orange man him self.... Donald Trump ....i ran upstairs and lock the door and called the police and he just kept banging on my door yelling “rate my app 5 stars” the police got here but it was to late he had already left 😪.

attributes.title: Horrible service!🤬😡🤯
attributes.review: I received a very poor service!Firstly the staffs Bad attitude towards customers. When the server showed up he showed severe lack of interest and was not welcoming at all! The service was horrible, my food didn’t show up for at least an hour and a half! So disappointed. I demand that you improve your services or I shall not return!

attributes.title: 👁👄👁 disgostang
attributes.review: This app is BOOTY. I have never felt so violated in my entire life. Immediately upon opening the app, within SECONDS the FBI located my IP and came CAREENING through my home via war style attack helicopters. They then proceeded to SHOVE me to the ground and ate all of my blueberry pop-tarts😔they also arrested my dog, Boofy, and are currently holding him in federal prison in solitary confinement. Unacceptable. I will be alerting General Jeon Jungkook about this immediately.💛🖤💛🖤💛

attributes.title: If I Could Make It Zero Stars I Would
attributes.review: I really just don’t think think app is good being that our president, Donald J Trump is not a good influence on our kids and future generations. He has quotes that he has said on live TV saying racist, sexist, and plain stupid things. He ok nice said “grab her by her pus*y” and that’s just a terrible things to have our daughters to hear and our sons to be influenced by. Thank you.

attributes.title: Poorly Made
attributes.review: I know the campaign is struggling but they could have given this app a little more funding! It’s purpose is to inform and with out it working I have to turn to the fake news to get all my info. When I try to use the app it glitches and closes for no reason. This doesn’t even deserve one star. It’s creation was a failure try again

attributes.title: You can not ban TikTok
attributes.review: This app is horrible. When I opened it up I started violently vomiting and did not stop for hours. Then when I stopped I tried to open it again and when I did my arms and legs fell off and now my mom has to type this for me because I can not. This should be illegal and I will never open the app again. Neither should you.

as i soon as i downloaded the app and entered my number i received so many spam messages in my inbox. i was expecting it, but what i didn’t expect, was that even after i cut off my messages and blocked the number... ANOTHER number associated with this app TEXTED ME AGAIN. they store your information and phone number and USE IT. absolutely disgusting.. 😇😇😇😇😇
